text: Krais ntige zɨgi. Ana zɨgap, ana Fhe Bakɨme rotu gari guman pan kav, ana ntige khar hɨgi bigir vhuuiŋ gari guman pan ki. Ana Hevenan ki Sher Phena vhuuŋ guarara, ana anan vhen vergap, kɨrar hɨgi. Mba Sher Phen, ana guigira mbe mba fhum muuŋgi Sher Phena kambarigi. Gumgi wari won farir mba phena muuŋgi fhuvara. Ne khaŋ muuŋgi, ana kha nuiana bigɨn fhuvara.
